title: ➽Spacious Beautiful Back Bay 1 Bedroom Available Now!
posting_body: Spacious Beautiful Back Bay 1 Bedroom Featuring Hardwood Floors, High Ceilings, Granite Counter Tops, Fantastic Natural Light, Great Closet Space, a Decorative Fireplace, and Microwave.
Right on Newbury Street in the Heart of Back Bay with Easy Access to the Boston Commons, Charles River, Downtown Boston, The Orange Line, and Much More!
Move in Costs: First Month's Rent, Security Deposit, and Broker Fee (No Last Month's Rent Upfront)
CFB Real Estate powered by Keller Williams
Thanks for checking out my listing.
I would love to work with you and find you a fantastic apartment, I offer Boston's largest personalized video database for ease of access!
